Shoot music videos, live performance clips, and promo content in a flexible Edmonton studio. Book full production support or choose a creator-focused solo session.

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I book a music video studio session in Edmonton without a full crew?

Yes. You can book our solo GoPro session for fast content creation without a full production team.

Do you offer full music video production support?

Yes. Our full production option includes a professional videographer, camera setup, lighting, and audio support.

What kind of music video content can I shoot at OT Vibez?

Artists use the space for performance videos, promo clips, social media reels, and behind-the-scenes content.
